author: dblevins
msg: fixed so it uses the javaee-api jar with the classifier -- it was still using the javaee-api-embedded jar which was removed a couple weeks ago.
excluding is a little tricker with two jars having the same group and artifact ids, but it now works.

author: dblevins

Switched "embedded" to "tomcat" -- should we stop supporting tomcat 6 and 5, we won't need this jar anymore and won't be maintaining it. it should have a name that says "don't use me"
